channel.title: Aureliano Untangling
channel.itunes:subtitle: Secular Dharma
channel.itunes:author: Aureliano Nava
channel.itunes:summary: Secular spiritituality, secular dharma, meaning, purpose, meditation, mental health, society, lots on suffering, more on suffering, end of suffering, all things human and dog.
channel.description: Discovering meaning and purpose in life can get trippy and wierd these days. Lots of nonesense and snake oil out there and if your're not cautious you might end up buying more than you can afford. I intend to Untagle what it means to live a life of meaning and purpose without having to accept dogmas and beliefs that can't be supported.
